description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Seoul, South Korea. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Modern Gangnam City Escape with High-End All-Day Dining Restaurant
hotels.description: Live your best life in the lively city of Gangnam at voco Seoul Gangnam, an IHG Hotel. This vibrant escape is the perfect retreat between excursions to the high-end restaurants, shiny fashion precincts and neon-lit nightlife of the city. Enjoy pillowy soft bao buns stuffed with crispy shrimp or signature saucy noodles at the all-day dining restaurant, Amarillo, before heading to the modern fitness centre to work up your appetite for dessert.

hotels.title: Contemporary Seoul Stay in Neon-Lit Gangnam with Six Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of Seoul’s Gangnam district, where neon signs invite you to experience the city's dynamic nightlife, at this stay near Sinnonhyeon station. The hotel features a cutting-edge fitness centre, an indoor pool and four distinctive dining options, including a gourmet Korean Omakase restaurant, along with two bars. Take a leisurely walk down the fashionable, tree-lined Garosu-gil, home to chic boutiques and trendy cafes, or explore the nearby COEX Mall, one of Asia's largest underground shopping destinations. After a day of adventure, relax at the onsite Gran A II Live Music Bar.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Five-Star Seoul Luxury with Two Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Designer Mall
hotels.description: There’s no better landmark of luxury than The Shilla Seoul. Having opened its doors over 40 years ago, with luxe renovations since then, it sets the standard for five-star living and time-honoured hospitality. Standing proudly on Namsan Mountain and surrounded by cascading traditional Korean buildings, the statuesque hotel sits among 23 acres of private wooded parkland and looks over Seoul’s commercial district. A must-visit property, The Shilla Seoul maintains a unique position as the first South Korean five-star hotel on the annual Forbes Travel Guide from 2019 through 2022. While it may be the oldest luxury accommodation in the sprawling city, The Shilla Seoul is still as fresh as its younger counterparts, with world-class rooms and facilities. Spend your days rubbing shoulders with Seoul’s elite on the third-floor Urban Island, where heated pools, jacuzzis, cabanas and heated sunbeds sit among a rooftop garden. Should the weather turn, visit Arcade, a 20-shop luxury mall with the likes of Hermès and Issey Miyake. However you spend your day, it should end at one of the hotel’s five restaurants. The top-floor La Yeon is the first Korean restaurant to earn two Michelin stars, while Palsun’s high-end Chinese has captured the hearts of locals, making it one of the most popular regional spots in the city.

hotels.title: Seoul Yongsan District Escape near Han River with Pool & Panoramic Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover the vibrant spirit of Seoul with this urban retreat in the heart of Yongsan, one of the city’s most energetic districts. From this sleek and modern base, you’re perfectly positioned to explore nearby highlights like the buzzing shops of the Myeongdong district and the timeless grandeur of Gyeongbokgung Palace. Dine your way around the world at Food Exchange, or take in sweeping skyline views with a meal at The 26. Whether you’re squeezing in a workout at the cutting-edge gym or enjoying a refreshing dip in the indoor pool, this is the perfect launchpad for your South Korean adventure.

hotels.title: Sleek Five-Star Seoul City Escape in Yeouido Island with Sky-High Rooftop Bar, Indoor Pool & Luxe Spa
hotels.description: Step into an artistic world of contemporary luxury and timeless elegance at this towering Seoul hotel, ensconced in the bustling heart of Yeouido Island. Designed by world-renowned architect Sir Richard Rogers, regale in the sophisticated interiors of the hotel, unwind in your plush room, or indulge in a gastronomic journey at one of the hotel's three exquisite dining venues. Go for a swim in the indoor pool, pamper with treatments at the spa or enjoy a craft cocktail on the 29th-floor rooftop bar, while relishing panoramic city and Han River vistas. If you wish to explore, Yeouido Hangang Park and the shopping district of Mydeongdong are mere moments away.

hotels.title: Modern Seoul Riverside Oasis with Rooftop Infinity Pool & Five Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant west of South Korea's pulsing capital from an elegantly appointed base located beside the Han River. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's ultra-cool infinity pool bar on the 20th floor for an expertly crafted cocktail and panoramic views of the city and the river below, or simply retreat to a light-filled room equipped with all the modern amenities you could want. Choose your flavour from different dining options, including the chic Restaurant VOISIN for French-inspired fare or Mapo Eight serving up freshly baked pastries and deliciously light meals. Fitness enthusiasts will love the well-equipped gym, while the indoor pool is the perfect space to soothe sore muscles.

hotels.title: Five-Star Lakefront Seoul City Break with Indoor Pool, Luxe Spa & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Overlooking the tranquil waters of Seokchon Lake, this sophisticated Sofitel sanctuary brings together Parisian charm and the warmth of Korean hospitality. Located in the stylish Jamsil district, it offers sleek, contemporary rooms and apartments with sweeping views of Seoul’s skyline, plus a Parisian speakeasy-style rooftop bar perched on the 32nd floor, perfectly placed for evenings spent sipping carefully crafted drinks. Indulge in French-inspired cuisine or modern Japanese dining, unwind at the serene spa, or soak up the lake views while swimming in the indoor pool. Just moments away, discover iconic attractions like Lotte World Tower, Seokchon Lake Park, and Olympic Park, all easily accessible thanks to the nearby metro, making it a perfect base for exploring the city.

hotels.title: Sky-high Seoul Yongsan Escape near Han River with Indoor Pool & Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Experience the dynamic energy of Seoul from a luxurious base located in the heart of the city's bustling Yongsan district. This sophisticated hotel offers easy access to the renowned Dragon Hill Spa, where you can soak in traditional Korean bathhouses, as well as the Yongsan Electronics Market, a haven for tech enthusiasts. Relish in the hotel's array of amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a sprawling indoor pool. Savour authentic Korean cuisine at the onsite restaurant or venture out to the nearby Itaewon district, renowned for its diverse dining options and vibrant nightlife.

hotels.title: Bold Five-Star Seoul Stay with Two Pools, Onsite Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Embrace the vibrant metropolitan culture of South Korea with an enticing stay at the chic five-star Mondrian Seoul Itaewon This stylish Mondrian hotel is a spectacle for the senses: offering a unique, inspired blend of modern design and authentic Korean culture, the hotel teems with immersive spaces and experiences curated to elevate your Seoul adventure. Take advantage of the hotel's prime location and explore the city's epic dining scene, historic attractions, buzzing shopping streets and vibrant nightlife. Return to a diverse collection of dining options, from modern Italian at Cleo to creative cocktails at the rooftop Privilege. After a long day of exploration, unwind with a swim in the indoor pool or cool off with a refreshing cocktail at Altitude Pool & Lounge as the sun sets over the Seoul skyline.

hotels.title: Contemporary Seoul City Break in the Heart of Gangnam City
hotels.description: Indulge in a true South Korean city experience at the contemporary InterContinental Grand Seoul Parnas, an IHG Hotel, ideally positioned in the centre of Gangnam, the buzzing heart of Seoul. Take in spectacular vistas of the vibrant city from the refurbished elegant rooms, make a splash in the indoor pool, or savour decadent cuisine at the hotel's bespoke restaurants.

hotels.title: Sky-High Novotel Seoul Escape near Dongdaemun Design Plaza with Rooftop Bar & Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Find yourself captivated by the contemporary charms of this stylish urban oasis, perfectly placed in the heart of one of Korea's prime shopping districts, Dongdaemun. A short stroll from the historic Heunginjimun Gate and the bustling Dongdaemun Design Plaza, this five-star hotel is an ideal base for seeing the best of Seoul. Relax and unwind in your well-appointed guest room, swim laps in the rooftop infinity pool or the heated indoor pool and cool off with well-crafted cocktails from the Roof Top Bar while soaking up the stunning city views. Plus, you can also dine on delectable Korean cuisine at Food Exchange and savour pastries from the Deli.
